channel.title: Comments on: Why is VMware Workstation 6.5RC1 a 544MB download?

item.title: By: Toni
item.dc:creator: Toni
item.description:
Well, WS 6.5 for Windows is that big probably because it has both 32 and 64-bit versions in the same executable!
You can see that the Linux versions are around 380 MB as they have separate versions for 32 and 64-bit systems!
item.content:encoded:
Well, WS 6.5 for Windows is that big probably because it has both 32 and 64-bit versions in the same executable!

You can see that the Linux versions are around 380 MB as they have separate versions for 32 and 64-bit systems!

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description: I suppose I should be thankful that it's not 2GB! :)
item.content:encoded: I suppose I should be thankful that it’s not 2GB! :)

item.title: By: Justme
item.dc:creator: Justme
item.description:
Welcome to software bloat.......
think about it.... if WS5 to WS6 was 6 times the size, so..... that means WS6.5 could have been upto 2GB! to stay inline. :)
As its only a .5 release, lets say 3 times the size, so thats only 1630mb!
But yes a nearly 10 times increase in download size from WS5 to WS6.5
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to software bloat…….

think about it…. if WS5 to WS6 was 6 times the size, so….. that means WS6.5 could have been upto 2GB! to stay inline. :)

As its only a .5 release, lets say 3 times the size, so thats only 1630mb!

But yes a nearly 10 times increase in download size from WS5 to WS6.5
